name: Infinite Rotate - Impossible Challenge Find the perfect moment with moving balls
name_original: Infinite Rotate - Impossible Challenge Find the perfect moment with moving balls
description:
Ready for some adventure? KuaShow Studio proudly presents Infinite Rotate.

Tap and jump on the colorful discs ◉, surviving as long as you can while collecting little dots. You also need to avoid dangerous hazards like saw blades, as well as not hitting the edge of the screen.
